data.comment: The match has started.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sevilla are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 8, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Huesca.
Throw-in Huesca.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
Rafa Mir gets his shot on target but fails to score for Huesca.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
In the minute 13, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Huesca a goal kick.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Huesca in the half of Sevilla.
Sevilla needs to be cautious. Huesca have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 23, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Huesca.
Karim Rekik (Sevilla) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
Huesca to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
In the minute 25, In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Sevilla throw-in in Huesca's half.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In the minute 27, Huesca have a goal kick.
Sevilla are pushing forward but Munir El Haddadi's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Huesca.
In the minute 31, Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Throw-in Huesca.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 32, Sevilla drive upfield and Lucas Ocampos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Huesca defender.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Free kick Sevilla.
In the minute 34, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Huesca a goal kick.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 38, Sevilla to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Huesca Sevilla attack through Oliver Torres. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 42, Huesca have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Huesca.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sevilla's half?
Luuk De Jong is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Luuk De Jong.
The second-half is underway at El Alcoraz.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Sevilla throw-in in Huesca's half.
In the minute 49, Borja Garcia for Huesca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sevilla goal kick.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Jaime Seoane (Huesca) has received a yellow card from Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In the minute 54, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Huesca.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 57, Free kick Sevilla.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
At El Alcoraz, Joan Jordan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
David Ferreiro is replacing Jaime Seoane for the home team.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Pablo Maffeo is booked for the home team.
Sevilla to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Sevilla throw-in in Huesca's half.
In the minute 63, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Julen Lopetegui is making the team's first substitution at El Alcoraz with Ivan Rakitic replacing Joan Jordan.
In the minute 64, Aleix Vidal is replacing Karim Rekik for Sevilla at El Alcoraz.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jesus Navas (Sevilla) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Sevilla are coming forward and Ivan Rakitic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Huesca.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 70, Sevilla's Oliver Torres has been booked in Huesca.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Borja Garcia with Javier Ontiveros. This is the second substitution made today by Michel.
In the minute 72, Huesca make their third substitution with Shinji Okazaki replacing Sandro Ramirez.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Oscar is on a sub for Luuk De Jong for Sevilla.
Throw-in Sevilla.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 75, Julen Lopetegui (Sevilla) is making a fourth substitution, with Youssef En-Nesyri replacing Oliver Torres.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Sevilla.
In Huesca Sevilla drive forward through Munir El Haddadi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Huesca throw-in in Sevilla's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Huesca.
In the minute 80, Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 81, Sevilla to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Sevilla have got their heads in front thanks to a Youssef En-Nesyri strike.
In the minute 83, That's a fine assist from Lucas Ocampos.
Shinji Okazaki (Huesca) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 85, Sevilla to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Huesca.
Huesca have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 86, The away team replace Munir El Haddadi with Nemanja Gudelj.
Sevilla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Sevilla just outside Huesca's area.
Pablo Insua for Huesca has been booked by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez and receives a first yellow card.
Huesca have a goal kick.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Sevilla.
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Sevilla a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Huesca. The final score is 0-1.
